org.gbif.common.parsers.geospatial

Class DatumParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.common.parsers.core.DictionaryBackedParser<T>
      • org.gbif.common.parsers.core.FileBasedDictionaryParser<Integer>
        • org.gbif.common.parsers.geospatial.DatumParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parsable<Integer>

    public class DatumParser
extends FileBasedDictionaryParser<Integer>
    Parser for geodetic datum strings into EPSG integer codes. These codes are suitable for instantiating spatial reference systems (SRS) in spatial libraries like geotools. See EPSG on Geotools. For mapping common names to EPSG codes use the code registry search here:
    • http://georepository.com/search/by-name/?query=samoa
    • http://epsg.io/
    • http://www.epsg-registry.org/
    • http://prj2epsg.org/apidocs.html

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatumParser getInstance()

      • parse

        public ParseResult<Integer> parse(String input)
        Description copied from class: DictionaryBackedParser
        Tries to parse the input data according to its backing dictionary. If no entry in the dictionary can be found the result will be FAIL otherwise the result will be a DEFINITE SUCCESS.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface Parsable<Integer>
        Overrides:
        parse in class DictionaryBackedParser<Integer>
        Parameters:
        input - To lookup in the dictionary
        Returns:
        the replacement from the dictionary
